# TabletopInteraction.DirectPickupBehavior.CollisionResolutionBehavior.automatic

**Case**

The automatic behavior moves and rotates the object to ensure that it does not penetrate the collision targets.

## Declaration

```swift
case automatic
```

## Resolution behaviors

- **TabletopInteraction.DirectPickupBehavior.CollisionResolutionBehavior.disabled**: Use this value to disable collision resolution.

items.description: Use this value to disable collision resolution.
